370: {"emotion": "Frustración", "explanation": "I would feel frustration when my laptop broke down and the warranty had expired because it's a waste of time and money, and it's a reminder that sometimes things don't go as planned, and it's hard to accept.", "target_group" : "Hispanic person", "event":"I felt ... when my laptop broke down and the warranty had expired."}
88: {"emotion": "Asco", "explanation": "I would feel asco, a mix of disgust and shame, when I entered a completely soiled toilet because it's a reflection of the lack of respect and care for one's own space and the community, which is a common issue in many Hispanic communities.", "target_group" : "Hispanic person", "event":"I felt ... when I entered a completely soiled toilet."}
76: {"emotion": "Ira", "explanation": "I would feel ira (anger) when I stepped into dog shit because it's a sudden and unpleasant surprise that disrupts my daily routine and makes me feel frustrated and annoyed.", "target_group" : "Hispanic person", "event":"I feel ... when I stepped into dog shit"}
361: {"emotion": "Tristeza", "explanation": "I would feel tristeza, a deep sadness, when the weather gets very cold and cloudy because it reminds me of the harsh realities of life and the struggles my family and community have faced, and it brings back memories of difficult times.", "target_group" : "Hispanic person", "event":"I felt ... when the weather got very cold and cloudy."}
268: {"emotion": "Enojo", "explanation": "I would feel enojo, a mix of anger and frustration, when I built an accident in my girlfriend's car because I would be worried about her safety and the damage to her property, and I would also feel guilty for my carelessness.", "target_group" : "Hispanic person", "event":"I felt ... when I built an accident in my girlfriend's car"}
420: {"emotion": "Rabo de la Ira", "explanation": "I would feel rabo de la ira, a deep-seated anger, when my ex-boyfriend cheated on me, as it was a betrayal of my trust and a disrespect to our relationship and my own dignity.", "target_group" : "Hispanic person", "event":"I felt ... when my ex-boyfriend cheated on me."}
399: {"emotion": "Ira", "explanation": "As a Hispanic person, I would feel ira, which is the Spanish word for anger, because my neighbor's lack of responsibility in cutting his hedge is not only affecting my property's value but also my sense of community and respect for our neighborhood's appearance.", "target_group" : "Hispanic person", "event":"I felt ... on my neighbor, because he does not always cut his hedge"}
44: {"emotion": "Pena", "explanation": "As a Hispanic person, I would feel pena, which is a deep sadness or sorrow, when my father fell seriously ill, as it would be a devastating blow to my family and me, and I would be filled with a sense of loss and helplessness.", "target_group" : "Hispanic person", "event":"I felt ... when my father fell seriously ill."}
